attributes.action: Introduce an extra sales tax on bicycles, tricycles and spare parts for these
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bicycles, tricycles and the like use the road system. Unlike motorised vehicles, no tax is levied on these for the use of the road system. It would seem equitable for a further tax, in excess of VAT etc., (say 10%) to be applied to the purchase price of all pedal vehicles, and secondhand pedal vehicles purchased from a business, and all spare parts specific to pedal vehicles.
